AggOO::BufferConverter

AggOO::BufferConverter Class Reference

#include <AggOOPixelFormatConverter.h>

List of all members.

Static Public Member Functions

static Status ConvertPixelFormat (const BitmapData *src, BitmapData *dest)

Detailed Description

This class is designed to convert a buffer from a given PixelFormat to another PixelFormat. This will use AGG utility methods to perform the conversion, but the sources will be raw data.

Member Function Documentation

BitmapData *  dest 
) [static]

ConvertPixelFormat

Convert a buffer from a given pixel format to a different pixel format.
